verses.verse: And Jesus<WG2424> went<WG1831> out, and departed<WG4198> from the temple:<WG2411> and his disciples<WG3101> came<WG4334> to him for to show<WG1925> him the buildings<WG3619> of the temple.<WG2411>

And Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> to them, See<WG991> you not all<WG3956> these<WG5023> things? truly<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you, There shall not be left<WG863> here<WG5602> one stone<WG3037> on another, that shall not be thrown<WG2647> down. <WG2647>

And as he sat<WG2521> on the mount<WG3735> of Olives,<WG1636> the disciples<WG3101> came<WG4334> to him privately,<WG2596> <WG2398> saying,<WG3004> Tell<WG2036> us, when<WG4218> shall these<WG5023> things be? and what<WG5101> shall be the sign<WG4592> of your coming,<WG3952> and of the end<WG4930> of the world?<WG165>
And Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> to them, Take heed<WG991> that no<WG3361> man<WG5100> deceive<WG4105> you.
For many<WG4183> shall come<WG2064> in my name,<WG3686> saying,<WG3004> I am<WG1510> Christ;<WG5547> and shall deceive<WG4105> many. <WG4183>

And you shall hear<WG191> of wars<WG4171> and rumors<WG189> of wars:<WG4171> see<WG3708> that you be not troubled:<WG2360> for all <WG3956> these things must<WG1163> come<WG1096> to pass, but the end<WG5056> is not yet. <WG3768>

For nation<WG1484> shall rise<WG1453> against<WG1909> nation,<WG1484> and kingdom<WG932> against<WG1909> kingdom:<WG932> and there shall be famines,<WG3042> and pestilences,<WG3061> and earthquakes,<WG4578> in divers places. <WG5117>
All<WG3956> these <WG5023> are the beginning<WG746> of sorrows. <WG5604>
Then<WG5119> shall they deliver<WG3860> you up to be afflicted,<WG2347> and shall kill<WG615> you: and you shall be hated of all<WG3956> nations<WG1484> for my name's<WG3686> sake.
And then<WG5119> shall many<WG4183> be offended,<WG4624> and shall betray<WG3860> one<WG240> another,<WG240> and shall hate<WG3404> one<WG240> another. <WG240>
And many<WG4183> false<WG5578> prophets<WG5578> shall rise,<WG1453> and shall deceive<WG4105> many. <WG4183>
And because<WG1223> iniquity<WG458> shall abound,<WG4129> the love<WG26> of many<WG4183> shall wax<WG5594> cold. <WG5594>
But he that shall endure<WG5278> to the end,<WG5056> the same<WG3778> shall be saved. <WG4982>

And this<WG5124> gospel<WG2098> of the kingdom<WG932> shall be preached<WG2784> in all<WG3650> the world<WG3625> for a witness<WG3142> to all<WG3956> nations;<WG1484> and then<WG5119> shall the end<WG5056> come. <WG2240>

When<WG3752> you therefore<WG3767> shall see<WG1492> the abomination<WG946> of desolation,<WG2050> spoken<WG4483> of by Daniel<WG1158> the prophet,<WG4396> stand<WG2476> in the holy<WG40> place,<WG5117> (whoever<WG3588> reads,<WG314> let him understand: <WG3539> )
Then<WG5119> let them which be in Judaea<WG2449> flee<WG5343> into<WG1909> the mountains: <WG3735>
Let him which is on<WG1909> the housetop<WG1430> not come<WG2597> down<WG2597> to take<WG142> any<WG5100> thing out of his house: <WG3614>
Neither<WG3361> let him which is in the field<WG68> return<WG1994> back<WG3694> to take<WG142> his clothes. <WG2440>
And woe<WG3759> to them that are with child, <WG1722> <WG1064> <WG2192> and to them that give suck<WG2337> in those<WG1565> days! <WG2250>
But pray<WG4336> you that your<WG5216> flight<WG5437> be not in the winter,<WG5494> neither<WG3366> on<WG1722> the sabbath<WG4521> day:

For then<WG5119> shall be great<WG3173> tribulation,<WG2347> such<WG3634> as was not since<WG575> the beginning<WG746> of the world<WG2889> to this<WG3568> time,<WG2540> no,<WG3361> nor <WG3364> <WG3761> ever<WG3364> shall be.

And except<WG1508> those<WG1565> days<WG2250> should be shortened,<WG2856> there should no <WG3756> <WG3956> flesh<WG4561> be saved:<WG4982> but for the elect's<WG1588> sake those<WG1565> days<WG2250> shall be shortened. <WG2856>
Then<WG5119> if<WG1437> any<WG5100> man shall say<WG2036> to you, See,<WG2400> here <WG5602> is Christ,<WG5547> or<WG2228> there;<WG5602> believe <WG4100> it not.

For there shall arise<WG1453> false Christs,<WG5580> and false<WG5578> prophets,<WG5578> and shall show<WG1325> great<WG3173> signs<WG4592> and wonders;<WG5059> so<WG5620> that, if <WG1487> it were possible,<WG1415> they shall deceive<WG4105> the very<WG2532> elect. <WG1588>
Behold,<WG2400> I have told<WG4280> you before. <WG4280>

Why<WG3767> if<WG1437> they shall say<WG2036> to you, Behold,<WG2400> he is in the desert;<WG2048> go<WG1831> not forth:<WG1831> behold, <WG2400> he is in the secret<WG5009> chambers;<WG5009> believe <WG4100> it not.
For as the lightning<WG796> comes<WG1831> out of the east,<WG395> and shines<WG5316> even to the west;<WG1424> so<WG3779> shall also<WG2532> the coming<WG3952> of the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> be.
For wherever <WG3699> <WG1437> the carcass<WG4430> is, there<WG1563> will the eagles<WG105> be gathered<WG4863> together. <WG4863>

Immediately<WG2112> after<WG3326> the tribulation<WG2347> of those<WG1565> days<WG2250> shall the sun<WG2246> be darkened,<WG4654> and the moon<WG4582> shall not give<WG1325> her light,<WG5338> and the stars<WG792> shall fall<WG4098> from heaven,<WG3772> and the powers<WG1411> of the heavens<WG3772> shall be shaken: <WG4531>

And then<WG5119> shall appear<WG5316> the sign<WG4592> of the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> in heaven:<WG3772> and then<WG5119> shall all<WG3956> the tribes<WG5443> of the earth<WG1093> mourn,<WG2875> and they shall see<WG3700> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> coming<WG2064> in the clouds<WG3507> of heaven<WG3772> with power<WG1411> and great<WG4183> glory. <WG1391>

And he shall send<WG649> his angels<WG32> with a great<WG3173> sound<WG5456> of a trumpet,<WG4536> and they shall gather<WG1996> together<WG1996> his elect<WG1588> from the four<WG5064> winds,<WG417> from one end<WG206> of heaven<WG3772> to the other. <WG1565>

Now<WG1161> learn<WG3129> a parable<WG3850> of the fig<WG4808> tree;<WG4808> When<WG3752> his branch<WG2798> is yet<WG2236> tender,<WG527> and puts<WG1631> forth<WG1631> leaves,<WG5444> you know<WG1097> that summer <WG2330> is near: <WG1451>
So<WG3779> likewise<WG2532> you, when<WG3752> you shall see<WG1492> all<WG3956> these<WG5023> things, know<WG1097> that it is near, <WG1451> even at<WG1909> the doors. <WG2374>
Truly<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you, This<WG3778> generation<WG1074> shall not pass,<WG3928> till<WG2193> all<WG3956> these<WG5023> things be fulfilled. <WG1096>
Heaven<WG3772> and earth<WG1093> shall pass<WG3928> away,<WG3928> but my words<WG3056> shall not pass<WG3928> away. <WG3928>
But of that day<WG2250> and hour<WG5610> knows<WG1492> no <WG3762> man ,<WG3762> no,<WG3761> not the angels<WG32> of heaven,<WG3772> but my Father<WG3962> only. <WG3441>
But as the days<WG2250> of Noe <WG3575> were, so<WG3779> shall also<WG2532> the coming<WG3952> of the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> be.

For as in the days<WG2250> that were before<WG4253> the flood<WG2627> they were eating<WG5176> and drinking,<WG4095> marrying<WG1060> and giving in marriage,<WG1547> until<WG891> the day<WG2250> that Noe<WG3575> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the ark, <WG2787>
And knew<WG1097> not until<WG2193> the flood<WG2627> came,<WG2064> and took<WG142> them all<WG537> away;<WG142> so<WG3779> shall also<WG2532> the coming<WG3952> of the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> be.
Then<WG5119> shall two<WG1417> be in the field;<WG68> the one<WG1520> shall be taken,<WG3880> and the other<WG1520> left. <WG863>
Two <WG1417> women<WG1135> shall be grinding<WG229> at<WG1722> the mill;<WG3459> the one<WG1520> shall be taken,<WG3880> and the other<WG1520> left. <WG863>
Watch<WG1127> therefore:<WG3767> for you know<WG1492> not what<WG4169> hour<WG5610> your<WG5216> Lord<WG2962> does come. <WG2064>

But know<WG1097> this,<WG1565> that if<WG1487> the manager<WG3611> of the house<WG3617> had known<WG1492> in what<WG4169> watch<WG5438> the thief<WG2812> would come,<WG2064> he would have watched,<WG1127> and would not have suffered<WG1439> his house<WG3614> to be broken<WG1358> up.
Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> be you also<WG2532> ready:<WG2092> for in such an hour<WG5610> as you think<WG1380> not the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> comes. <WG2064>

Who<WG5101> then<WG686> is a faithful<WG4103> and wise<WG5429> servant,<WG1401> whom<WG3739> his lord<WG2962> has made<WG2525> ruler<WG2525> over<WG1909> his household,<WG2322> to give<WG1325> them meat<WG5160> in due season? <WG2540>
Blessed <WG3107> is that servant,<WG1401> whom<WG3739> his lord<WG2962> when he comes<WG2064> shall find<WG2147> so<WG3779> doing. <WG4160>
Truly<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you, That he shall make<WG2525> him ruler<WG2525> over<WG1909> all<WG3956> his goods. <WG5224>
But and if<WG1437> that evil<WG2556> servant<WG1401> shall say<WG2036> in his heart,<WG2588> My lord<WG2962> delays<WG5549> his coming; <WG2064>
And shall begin<WG756> to smite <WG5180> his fellow servants,<WG4889> and to eat<WG2068> and drink<WG4095> with the drunken; <WG3184>
The lord<WG2962> of that servant<WG1401> shall come<WG2240> in a day<WG2250> when he looks<WG4328> not for him, and in an hour<WG5610> that he is not aware<WG1097> of,
And shall cut<WG1371> him asunder,<WG1371> and appoint <WG5087> him his portion<WG3313> with the hypocrites:<WG5273> there<WG1563> shall be weeping<WG2805> and gnashing<WG1030> of teeth. <WG3599>
